Articles.Content:
I'm kinda late for this, considering I got ksp this Christmas, but hi. I'm a fairly experienced KSP player who's got a moon base, a fully scanned Kerbin and Mun, no mining rig thingies yet (Karbonite is kinda tricky to understand), uhhhhmmm, and an untouched Minmus. I should really go there. I mostly play sandbox, but career is nice. Oh, I have some satellites and a Mass Relay. (Danny has taught me well :3).

Yeeeeaaaah stuff. Not sure what I should say here. Don't add.. eehhhhh... things. What DON'T you add to rockets in KSP? Nothing. That's the answer.

I better stop rambling now.

Cheers!

I'm also from Murica. So I know the ways of democracy, it's in my blood.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-19T13:20:06Z" title="02/19/2015 01:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 19, 2015</time> by polan**
Welcome aboard-ish! Quite a few players are late with their introductions, no worries.

Good to know.

I found a rift! This needs inspection. And written down coordinates.

Upon further inspection, after quickloading, the game was super slow cuz my rig disappeared, and when I crashed into the rig, the game crashes. Yaaaaaay

Hello, moarpower! Seems like you're getting along quite well.

If you have any questions, ask, or check out [Gameplay Questions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials) and the [Tutorials](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials) sections.
Yup! I know the dealio. These forums are super helpful.

I need to goto Duna (Without hyperedit e-e). And, i'm gonna turn it into a kind-of story thing. Cuz wynat. I just need a name and a rocket. (Don't throw rockets at me, but names would be appreciated)

STAY TOOND
